entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -18.0Â°C

entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 gusting to 80 near the Richardson mountains this evening and after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
